name: Where's My Garbage?
description: Ever wonder where all those empty coffee cups go? Where hundreds of thousands of black, heavy garbage bags are laid to rest? In Where’s My Garbage, you not only find out where we store our trash, but you also have the (unfortunate) job of getting it there in the most efficient way. As the newly appointed Director of Landfill Construction by the mayor of Egabrag City, it is up to you to find a solution to the city’s waste disposal; otherwise, you lose your job and get tossed out, just like another discarded coffee cup.
